quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Buffy and Character
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, buffy, angel. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

options.text: a vampire with a soul and Buffys ex-lover

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a vampire with a soul and Buffys ex-lover

questions.question: Which of these is a nickname of the vampire character Spike, featured on Buffy the Vampire Slayer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: William the Bloody

options.text: Me First and the Gimme Gimmes

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nerf Herder

questions.question: Which character on Buffy the Vampire Slayer was played by actress Eliza Dushku?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The First

questions.question: What was the name of the musical episode of season 6 of Buffy the Vampire Slayer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Once More, With Feeling

questions.question: What creature was Oz in the TV series Buffy the Vampire Slayer?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Pointy

questions.question: Who is the creator of the TV series Buffy the Vampire Slayer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Joss Whedon
